name: 404 kph
description:
Warning: can take a few minutes to load and requires a decent GPU (as of 2020).

Compete for the best time as you fly through winding tracks in this retro racing sim. Export your replays as text and share them, and your friends will be able to race against you!

This game was a submission for js13kGames 2020. The whole thing consists of a single HTML file which, when zipped, is under 13 kilobytes in size.
